Metadata.Title: Cached Data Is Deleted after Use
Metadata.DirectLink: Cached Data Is Deleted after Use

Content.Data:
==What to Check For==
Verify that cached data is deleted after use.
==Why==
If the device is lost or compromised, cached data may be recovered by attackers.
==How to Check==
To verify that cached data is deleted after use:
# **Identify cached data.** Make a list of all data cached by the application. Find code that is responsible for each peace of data that is cached. # **Verify that sensitive data is not cached.** Examine code that caches data to verify that sensitive data is not cached.
==How to Fix==
To delete cached data after use:
# **Identify cached data.** Make a list of all data cached by the application. Find code that is responsible for each peace of data that is cached. # **Do not cache sensitive data.** Examine code that caches data to verify that sensitive data is not cached. # **Add code that removes cached data.** For all code that caches data, make sure that there is code that removes the data that has been cached.
